docs.snippet: Deep-freezing donated organs might one day help improve the transplant supply but scientists must first figure out how to thaw the delicate tissue without it cracking. Now researchers are taking a first step toward that goal, using nanotechnology ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Deep-freezing donated organs might one day help improve the transplant supply but scientists must first figure out how to thaw the delicate tissue without it cracking. Now researchers are taking a first step toward that goal, using nanotechnology to create super heaters for preserved tissue.

headline.main: First Step to Help Preserved Organs Survive the Deep Freeze
headline.print_headline: First Step to Help Preserved Organs Survive the Deep Freeze
